summary: The Organ Donation Referral Improvement Act (H.R. 330) directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct a comprehensive study on the use of electronic automated referral systems for organ donation in hospitals. Within one year, the study will assess the system's impact on staff time, donation volumes, and the identification of potential donors using electronic health records. It will also review best practices, IT security, and clinical literature, ultimately developing recommendations for nationwide implementation. The findings must be reported to relevant House and Senate committees.
